en.hero_title: Blue is a powerful platform to create, manage, and scale processes.
en.hero_subtitle_logged_in: Pick up where you left off or explore what's new in Blue.
en.hero_subtitle_default: Meet the system for modern operations — gain visibility, speed up processes, and scale your organization.

news_bar.main_text: You can now create your own branded version of Blue with the White Label module.

designed_to_turn.title:
Designed to turn everything
into a clear process.
designed_to_turn.description: Because great organizations thrive on clear, repeatable processes.

built_for_work.title: Built for how you actually work
built_for_work.description: Your processes with no forced workflows or rigid structures.

platform_for_customers.title: A platform for customers, not investors
platform_for_customers.description: Founder-led, profitable, and built for decades not quarters.

fair_pricing.title: Fair pricing that scales with you
fair_pricing.description: $7/user. No surprises. Save 90% vs enterprise tools.

en.work_the_way: Work — the way it should be.

one_source.title: One source of truth.
one_source.description: Create records for all your business data, so you finally have one place to keep everything.

workspaces.description: keep everything private with the right links

everything_process.title: Everything is a process.
everything_process.description: Blue helps you create clear, repeatable processes for everything you do.

checklists.description: ensure everyone knows what to do

automations.title: Automations help you scale.
automations.description: Blue's powerful automation engine handles everything from status updates and notifications to complex multi-step workflows.

your_data.title: Your perfect data structure.
your_data.description: Create custom fields, design your own record types, and build the perfect database that fits your exact workflow.

dashboards.title: Real-time management dashboards.
dashboards.description: Easily build dashboards that automatically update as your data changes.

testimonials.quote_1: Blue keeps things completely organized — it's an absolutely wonderful tool.
testimonials.quote_2: The automation features of Blue help us run our operations seamlessly.
testimonials.quote_3: My entire life is in Blue! I love how fantasticly responsive the team is.
testimonials.quote_4: If you're wondering if you should buy Blue...the answer is YES.

security.title: Security
security.description: Enterprise-grade security with end-to-end encryption and compliance certifications.

performance.title: Performance
performance.description: Lightning-fast response times and 99.9% uptime guarantee for mission-critical work.

analytics.title: Analytics
analytics.description: Real-time insights and customizable dashboards to track what matters most.

integrations.title: Integrations
integrations.description: Connect with 7,000+ tools including Slack, Gmail, Zapier, and custom APIs.

automations_grid.title: Automations
automations_grid.description: Streamline workflows with intelligent automation that learns from your processes.

mobile.title: Mobile Apps
mobile.description: Work on the go with apps for iPhone, iPad, and Android devices.

collaboration.title: Collaboration
collaboration.description: Real-time collaboration tools with comments, mentions, and team workspaces.

customization.title: Customization
customization.description: Fully customizable interface, fields, and workflows to match your business needs.

support.title: Support
support.description: Free email support with optional paid phone support.

integrations.title: Connect with 7,000+ tools through our integration partners

testimonial_kyriacos.quote: Blue has massively helped us manage our data work, ensuring that our teams are clear on what they need to do, and why. It's a great tool for us.
testimonial_kyriacos.name: Kyriacos Koupparis, PhD
testimonial_kyriacos.title: Head of Unit, Early Warning and Forecasting, World Food Programme.
